cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP address to an unreachable IP will cause socket binding failure and prevent F1 interface establishment.

du.explanation_en: Setting the downlink carrier offset to an out-of-range value will cause frequency misalignment and prevent proper downlink carrier allocation and UE reception.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行載波偏移設定為超出範圍的值會導致頻率錯位，並阻止正確的下行載波分配和 UE 接收。
